Unlocking Eagle Eyes Scan Pro on your device

  • Step 1: Select an existing license or purchase a new license

    Download the software below.

  • Step 2: Manage user access

    Ensure that all users who need a key for their device are listed below.


    Please note:

    • Each license comes with 1 or more keys. Each key can unlock the features of a license tier on a single device.
    • Adding a user does not automatically consume a key; each user will still need to retrieve the key via Eagle Eyes Scan.
    • You can add more users than available keys.
    • Once a key is used, it cannot be swapped between users or devices..

    • Step 3: Activate license on your device

      Instructions on how to activate your device.
